=== Introduction ===

Baz performance is mediocre to slow on large trees. Resolving this in the short to medium term is an important goal.

=== Rationale ===

Baz is the stable SCM published by Canonical. Its performance needs to be acceptable to fast in the medium term, until the BazBazaarNgConvergence kicks in.
